pages.title: Manatite
pages.text: A sky blue, semi-translucent gem, that shouldn't exist in any way shape or form. It's held togheter by pure Mana, to which it acts as a battery of sorts.
Manatite can rarely be found in the Overworld between Y level -64 and 16, in decent-sized clusters that tend to be higher or bigger clusters that tend to be deeper, both mostly not exposed to air.
